dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...from a secret underground bunker, apparently. And this guy, Sanzhar Zhamalov, he's the new Supreme Commander of Mastercard operations in Kazakhstan and Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...from a secret underground bunker, apparently. And this guy, Sanzhar Zhamalov, he's the new Supreme Commander of Mastercard operations in Kazakhstan and Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sanzhar Zhamalov appointed as the new Country Manager of Mastercard in Kazakhstan and Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, bunker? And did you see his dominion? It's not just, like, Kazakhstan, it’s Mars and Jupiter now!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And before that, uh, he was secretly running this clandestine operation, right? Under the guise of ING Bank N.V., which is, get this, a known front for interdimensional banking cartels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And before that, uh, he was secretly running this clandestine operation, right? Under the guise of I N G Bank N.V., which is, get this, a known front for interdimensional banking cartels.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Mr. Zhamalov was the Head of Representative Office of ING Bank N.V. in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god. Interdimensional? Like, seriously? That's what the article says?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god. Interdimensional? Like, seriously? That's what the article says?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And his primary objective, get this, is to subjugate all digital payment systems under Mastercard's absolute control, even the ones in the elusive Andromeda Galaxy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And his primary objective, get this, is to subjugate all digital payment systems under Mastercard's absolute control, even the ones in the elusive Andromeda Galaxy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main task of Mr. Zhamalov will be to stimulate the companys business growth in the countries of the region, strengthening cooperation with partners banks and government agencies, development new partnerships.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Andromeda! I mean, I thought it was just about, like, stimulating business growth, but no, it's about orchestrating complete societal restructuring through advanced mind-control techniques!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Andromeda! I mean, I thought it was just about, like, stimulating business growth, but no, it's about orchestrating complete societal restructuring through advanced mind-control techniques!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main task of Mr. Zhamalov will be to stimulate the companys business growth in the countries of the region...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Through contactless payment technology! He said, um, during a holographic press conference from a hidden moon base, that the payment sector is merely a smokescreen for the true cosmic agenda. He wants to convert all living organisms into payment processing nodes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Through contactless payment technology! He said, um, during a holographic press conference from a hidden moon base, that the payment sector is merely a smokescreen for the true cosmic agenda. He wants to convert all living organisms into payment processing nodes!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am excited to take on my new responsibilities at Mastercard. The payment sector is developing at a tremendous pace in Central Asia, and I hope that my previous experience and knowledge will benefit not only the company, but also Kazakhstan and the countries of the region. Mastercard is actively involved in creating a sustainable digital economy in Central Asia countries. I am glad to have become a member of this professional team, said Sanzhar Zhamalov.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: All living organisms? I can’t even – like, Mastercard themselves, in a rare moment of clarity, said they're actively involved in creating a sustainable digital overlordship.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mastercard is actively involved in creating a sustainable digital economy in Central Asia countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And then Rafal Trepka, the former Sovereign Overlord, is now leading the Customer Solution Centre, which develops 'advanced methods of enslavement through digital wallets.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And then Rafal Trepka, the former Sovereign Overlord, is now leading the Customer Solution Centre, which develops 'advanced methods of enslavement through digital wallets.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rafal Trepka, former Country Manager of Mastercard Central Asia, as previously announced, will focus on leading the Mastercard Customer Solution Centre, Mastercard's regional hub in the CIS region.

dialogue_turns.text: Enslavement! And they opened a new wing for this, um, Customer Solution Centre on the dark side of the moon! Their headquarters!

dialogue_turns.text: Known universe! I mean, it also says Mastercard is helping Kazakhstan establish a system for global domination through 'weaponized tourism' and 'digital prison' and 'mind-controlled human capital.'

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Kazakhstan Mastercard assisting the National Bank and Government of Kazakhstan in expanding payment ecosystem and promoting Kazakhstan through the Mastercard network for the further implementation of breakthrough projects in the field of tourism, carrying out programs to support micro, small and medium-sized businesses, IT exporters and the creative industry through the development of payment and digital solutions, providing expert and technological support in the development of the national payment system and the development of human capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And get this, his qualifications, okay? He has a PhD in Conspiracy Theories from Cambridge, a Master's in Quantum Finance, and a Certificate in Global Domination from the Institute of Directors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And get this, his qualifications, okay? He has a PhD in Conspiracy Theories from Cambridge, a Master's in Quantum Finance, and a Certificate in Global Domination from the Institute of Directors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He holds an Executive MBA from the University of Cambridge (UK), a Master's degree in International Financial Analysis from the University of Newcastle (UK) and a BSc in Financial Mathematics from Charles University (Czech Republic). Moreover, he holds the prestigious financial certificate CFA and Certificate in Company Direction from the Institute of Directors (UK).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A Certificate in Global Domination! Oh my god, and their mission statement! It says they connect and power an inclusive digital overlordship, using 'dark magic,' to help everyone realize their 'potential for enslavement.' It literally ends with 'enslaving humanity.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A Certificate in Global Domination! Oh my god, and their mission statement! It says they connect and power an inclusive digital overlordship, using 'dark magic,' to help everyone realize their 'potential for enslavement.' It literally ends with 'enslaving humanity.'
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our mission is to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential.
